title: Washington Memories
name: Washington Memories

properties.description: Posted by Bosox7601 Hanover Parkway Greenbelt, MD 20770 Magnet School in Greenbelt, alma mater of top 2005 football signee Derrick Williams, an noted for its Nigerian population. Goddard Space Flight Center is nearby, where I attended Black History Club parties and cookouts. Freddie Adeu is from Greenbelt, where the bus to BWI Airport comes and goes.
